title: New Team LF all!
body:
Hey guys,

So a bunch of friends and I that are pretty new to LoL and just all hit 30 are making a ranked team. We have pretty high ranked experience in other games such as Starcraft and World of Warcraft and we are hoping to make a strong team here. Currently, we'd be interested in anyone who's willing to work hard at improving their play and play some ranked 5s with us.

Add me in game at Husky King or leave a post here and I'll try get to you.

replies.body:
I'm out of town til Sunday but hit me up if u need a support or mid. 

Ign: 0dyssey.  (Its a zero not o)

my main account's on another server, but if you still need a support here it would be nice to join c:
currently level 29 but in a day or two it'll be 30 if i have nothing better to do.
im keen if thiers a jungle or top spot open
Sent requests in game to you both!

Sounds like my kind of team.

I'm not new to LoL.

But I'm far from LCS level at the moment.

But I have a fairly decent knowledge of the game.

Hit me up in game with an add if that sounds good to you.
